text: Dan Rattiner (born August 15, 1939) is an American journalist and newspaper publisher. In 1965, Rattiner co-founded the Manhattan-based underground newspaper The East Village Other with Walter Bowart, Allan Katzman, and John Wilcock. He also founded The Block Island Times in 1970. Rattiner hosted a weekly radio show, The Hamptons Report, on WQXR for six years during the 1990s. On April 24, 2015, Rattiner announced his plans to run for President of the United States as an Independent in the 2020 presidential elections. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:American cartoonists Category:2020 United States presidential candidates Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Independent politicians in the United States
title: Dan Rattiner
